ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And persevere in the way of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and persevere for your Lord's sake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Exercise patience to please your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And for the sake of your Lord, patiently endure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And be patient for the sake of your Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And for the sake of your Lord, be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and be patient unto thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For the sake of thy Lord, be patient!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and for the sake of your Lord, be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And for the good-will of thy Lord be thou patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and be patient for the sake of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But, for thy Lord's (Cause), be patient and constant!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And be patient for the sake of your Lord (i.e. perform your duty to Allah)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And be constant for your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But for your Lord be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:7] and endure patiently for the sake of your Lord, [all His] commands and prohibitions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For the sake of thy Lord, be patient!) Be patient in the worship and obedience of your Lord.
